content: just a little frog in a pot with a flower can be a decoration or container for stuff low sew pattern finished product is 3 5 x 3 5 materials - light brown yarn worsted weight - blue yarn worsted weight - light green yarn worsted weight - black yarn worsted weight or 2 safety eyes - pink yarn fingering weight - 4mm hook - 3mm hook - needle to weave in ends - stitch markers or bobby pins - stuffing edit the first pdf had a bunch of typos my bad should be fixed now
